document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalogue of the type material of Elateroidea Leach, 1815 (Coleoptera) deposited in the Coleoptera collection of the Museum of Zoology of the University of São Paulo, Brazil

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalogue of the type material of Elateroidea Leach, 1815 (Coleoptera) deposited in the Coleoptera collection of the Museum of Zoology of the University of São Paulo, Brazil

subSubSection.paragraph:
Holotype :
1 ♂
. Mairiporã, SP, Brasil ,
4–13 . I. 1967
, C. Costa col.; [on red] Holótipo; [on red]
Pyrearinus micatus
sp. n. holótipo, C. Costa det. 1978 .
Conservation status: Good condition.

Paratypes :
15 [unknown sex]. Mairiporã, SP, Brasil ,
4–13 . I. 1967
, C. Costa col.; [on red]
Pyrearinus micatus
sp. n. parátipo, C. Costa det. 1978 .
Conservation status: Good condition.

, 4 [unknown sex]. Três Lagoas, MT, marg. esq. Rio Sucuriu, Faz. Canaã,
I. 1967
, F. Lane col.; [on red]
Pyrearinus micatus
sp. n. parátipo, C. Costa det. 1978 .
Conservation status: Good condition; one male with abdomen glued on card under specimen, and genitalia on transparent card.

8 [unknown sex]. São Paulo, Ypiranga; [on red]
Pyrearinus micatus
sp. n. parátipo, C. Costa det. 1978 .

Conservation status: Good condition. One specimen with prothorax detached of the rest of the body.
